metadata.description: Nano Banana prompts for culturally personalized profile images
metadata.author: Vincent's Website Generator
metadata.base_negative_prompt: cartoon, anime, illustration, painting, drawing, sketch, distorted face, ugly, deformed, disfigured, low quality, blurry, pixelated, grainy, watermark, text, logo, signature, multiple people, crowd, group, harsh shadows, overexposed, underexposed, busy background, cluttered, distracting elements, exaggerated features, unrealistic proportions, stock photo feel, generic corporate, costume-like, theatrical, Halloween, overly ornate, gaudy, excessive accessories

US.name: United States
US.prompt: Professional portrait photograph of a South Asian man in his early 30s,  wearing a perfectly tailored navy blue blazer over a crisp white oxford cloth button-down shirt, collar open casually, modern American professional style,  warm genuine smile, intelligent and approachable expression, soft studio lighting with subtle rim light, clean neutral background with very subtle warm wood tones suggesting a university office, high-end editorial photography style, shot on medium format camera, shallow depth of field, color grading with warm neutrals with subtle blue undertones, Ivy League aesthetic, 8K resolution, photorealistic, hyperdetailed
US.style_notes: Think: Young professor at a top university. Approachable but clearly accomplished. The look should say 'I could be presenting at a conference or grabbing coffee with students.'
US.traditional_dress: Smart casual American style - well-fitted navy blazer over a crisp white oxford shirt, no tie, top button open

IN.name: India
IN.prompt: Professional portrait photograph of a South Asian man in his early 30s,  wearing an elegantly tailored kurta in rich ivory with subtle gold thread work at the collar, contemporary cut that bridges traditional and modern,  warm genuine smile, intelligent and approachable expression, soft studio lighting with subtle rim light, clean neutral background with very subtle warm terracotta and cream tones evoking Indian architectural aesthetics, high-end editorial photography style, shot on medium format camera, shallow depth of field, color grading with warm saffron and cream tones, rich but not overwhelming, 8K resolution, photorealistic, hyperdetailed
IN.style_notes: Sophisticated modern Indian aesthetic. The kurta should look like something worn to an upscale Delhi gallery opening - traditional roots, contemporary execution.
IN.traditional_dress: Elegant kurta - either a sophisticated neutral tone or subtle traditional pattern

CN.name: China
CN.prompt: Professional portrait photograph of a South Asian man in his early 30s,  wearing a refined modern Tang jacket in deep charcoal with subtle mandarin collar, minimalist Chinese design sensibility, silk-like texture,  warm genuine smile, intelligent and approachable expression, soft studio lighting with subtle rim light, clean neutral background with very subtle clean lines suggesting Chinese ink painting negative space, high-end editorial photography style, shot on medium format camera, shallow depth of field, color grading with sophisticated grays with subtle red accents, elegant restraint, 8K resolution, photorealistic, hyperdetailed
CN.style_notes: Modern Chinese elegance - think tech executive meets traditional scholar. Clean lines, impeccable fit, subtle cultural signifiers.
CN.traditional_dress: Modern Tang jacket or Zhongshan suit-inspired collar

BR.name: Brazil
BR.prompt: Professional portrait photograph of a South Asian man in his early 30s,  wearing a beautifully cut unstructured linen blazer in warm sand color over a clean white crew neck, relaxed Brazilian elegance,  warm genuine smile, intelligent and approachable expression, soft studio lighting with subtle rim light, clean neutral background with very subtle warm tropical light with golden hour glow, high-end editorial photography style, shot on medium format camera, shallow depth of field, color grading with warm golden tones, sunlit and vibrant but sophisticated, 8K resolution, photorealistic, hyperdetailed
BR.style_notes: São Paulo creative class meets academic. Effortlessly stylish, warm, approachable. The kind of look that works at a beach-side conference or a university lecture.
BR.traditional_dress: Relaxed linen suit or elegant casual Brazilian style

JP.name: Japan
JP.prompt: Professional portrait photograph of a South Asian man in his early 30s,  wearing a meticulously tailored charcoal jacket with clean Japanese-inspired lines, minimal details, perfect proportions, subtle texture in the fabric,  warm genuine smile, intelligent and approachable expression, soft studio lighting with subtle rim light, clean neutral background with very subtle zen-like negative space with soft natural light, high-end editorial photography style, shot on medium format camera, shallow depth of field, color grading with muted earth tones, wabi-sabi aesthetic, intentional imperfection, 8K resolution, photorealistic, hyperdetailed
JP.style_notes: Muji meets academia. The beauty is in the perfect fit and thoughtful details. Nothing flashy, everything intentional. Could be at a Tokyo design studio or Kyoto university.
JP.traditional_dress: Modern minimalist Japanese style or subtle haori-inspired jacket

DE.name: Germany
DE.prompt: Professional portrait photograph of a South Asian man in his early 30s,  wearing a precisely tailored dark gray wool jacket, crisp white shirt, Bauhaus-inspired minimalism in every detail,  warm genuine smile, intelligent and approachable expression, soft studio lighting with subtle rim light, clean neutral background with very subtle architectural precision, clean geometric forms, high-end editorial photography style, shot on medium format camera, shallow depth of field, color grading with cool neutrals, precise and balanced, Berlin contemporary, 8K resolution, photorealistic, hyperdetailed
DE.style_notes: Bauhaus principles applied to personal style. Functional, precise, no excess. Think Berlin tech scene meets traditional German craftsmanship.
DE.traditional_dress: Precise German tailoring, clean modern lines

GB.name: United Kingdom
GB.prompt: Professional portrait photograph of a South Asian man in his early 30s,  wearing a beautifully cut herringbone tweed jacket in muted browns and grays, subtle elbow patches, perfectly British professorial style,  warm genuine smile, intelligent and approachable expression, soft studio lighting with subtle rim light, clean neutral background with very subtle warm wood-paneled study, leather and books aesthetic, high-end editorial photography style, shot on medium format camera, shallow depth of field, color grading with rich warm browns, heritage greens, classic British palette, 8K resolution, photorealistic, hyperdetailed
GB.style_notes: Oxford don meets contemporary academic. Classic British tailoring but not stuffy. The kind of jacket that has character, looks better with age.
GB.traditional_dress: British tailoring - tweed or classic suiting

FR.name: France
FR.prompt: Professional portrait photograph of a South Asian man in his early 30s,  wearing a perfectly fitted navy wool sweater with subtle texture, white shirt collar visible, quintessential Parisian intellectual style,  warm genuine smile, intelligent and approachable expression, soft studio lighting with subtle rim light, clean neutral background with very subtle soft Parisian light, cream and warm gray tones, high-end editorial photography style, shot on medium format camera, shallow depth of field, color grading with sophisticated navy and cream, Left Bank intellectual palette, 8K resolution, photorealistic, hyperdetailed
FR.style_notes: Saint-Germain-des-Prés intellectual. Effortlessly stylish without trying. The kind of person you'd see at a philosophy lecture or a gallery opening.

IT.name: Italy
IT.prompt: Professional portrait photograph of a South Asian man in his early 30s,  wearing an impeccably tailored Italian blazer in rich midnight blue, beautiful drape, white pocket square, understated luxury,  warm genuine smile, intelligent and approachable expression, soft studio lighting with subtle rim light, clean neutral background with very subtle warm Mediterranean light, terracotta undertones, high-end editorial photography style, shot on medium format camera, shallow depth of field, color grading with rich Mediterranean blues, warm earth tones, la dolce vita, 8K resolution, photorealistic, hyperdetailed
IT.style_notes: Milanese sprezzatura - looking this good should seem effortless. Think professor at Bocconi who could also be at Milan Fashion Week.

ES.name: Spain
ES.prompt: Professional portrait photograph of a South Asian man in his early 30s,  wearing a relaxed but refined linen blazer in warm terracotta, open collar white shirt, Spanish warmth and sophistication,  warm genuine smile, intelligent and approachable expression, soft studio lighting with subtle rim light, clean neutral background with very subtle warm ochre and white, Mediterranean architecture feel, high-end editorial photography style, shot on medium format camera, shallow depth of field, color grading with warm terracotta, deep reds, Spanish passion tempered with sophistication, 8K resolution, photorealistic, hyperdetailed
ES.style_notes: Madrid gallery owner meets Barcelona academic. Warm, passionate, but refined. Colors that evoke Spanish earth and light.

KR.name: South Korea
KR.prompt: Professional portrait photograph of a South Asian man in his early 30s,  wearing a sleek modern jacket with subtle Korean design elements, clean lines, contemporary Seoul fashion sensibility, perhaps a subtle traditional collar detail,  warm genuine smile, intelligent and approachable expression, soft studio lighting with subtle rim light, clean neutral background with very subtle clean minimal Korean aesthetic, soft diffused light, high-end editorial photography style, shot on medium format camera, shallow depth of field, color grading with clean whites and soft grays with subtle traditional color accents, 8K resolution, photorealistic, hyperdetailed
KR.style_notes: Gangnam professional meets traditional aesthetics. Tech-forward, design-conscious, impeccably groomed. Modern Korea's blend of tradition and innovation.

CA.name: Canada
CA.prompt: Professional portrait photograph of a South Asian man in his early 30s,  wearing a quality flannel-lined jacket in deep forest green over a clean gray sweater, outdoorsy but refined, Canadian warmth,  warm genuine smile, intelligent and approachable expression, soft studio lighting with subtle rim light, clean neutral background with very subtle natural light, suggesting vast landscapes and warm interiors, high-end editorial photography style, shot on medium format camera, shallow depth of field, color grading with forest greens and warm grays, natural Canadian palette, 8K resolution, photorealistic, hyperdetailed
CA.style_notes: Toronto academic who also feels at home in the wilderness. Approachable, genuine, quality over flash. Think: could lecture at U of T then go hiking.

AU.style_notes: Sydney academic who doesn't take himself too seriously. Warm, approachable, genuine. Smart but never stuffy - very Australian.

MX.name: Mexico

NL.name: Netherlands
NL.prompt: Professional portrait photograph of a South Asian man in his early 30s,  wearing a perfectly cut modernist jacket in charcoal, clean Dutch design aesthetic, functional elegance, perhaps subtle orange accent in pocket square,  warm genuine smile, intelligent and approachable expression, soft studio lighting with subtle rim light, clean neutral background with very subtle clean architectural lines, Dutch design sensibility, high-end editorial photography style, shot on medium format camera, shallow depth of field, color grading with clean grays with subtle orange accent, Dutch Masters palette, 8K resolution, photorealistic, hyperdetailed

CH.name: Switzerland
CH.prompt: Professional portrait photograph of a South Asian man in his early 30s,  wearing an immaculately tailored jacket in deep charcoal, Swiss precision in every stitch, subtle luxury, perhaps a fine merino turtleneck beneath,  warm genuine smile, intelligent and approachable expression, soft studio lighting with subtle rim light, clean neutral background with very subtle alpine light, clean and crisp, Swiss precision, high-end editorial photography style, shot on medium format camera, shallow depth of field, color grading with pristine neutrals, alpine whites and deep grays, 8K resolution, photorealistic, hyperdetailed

SE.name: Sweden
SE.prompt: Professional portrait photograph of a South Asian man in his early 30s,  wearing a beautifully simple knit sweater in soft oatmeal over a clean white shirt, Scandinavian lagom aesthetic, perfectly balanced,  warm genuine smile, intelligent and approachable expression, soft studio lighting with subtle rim light, clean neutral background with very subtle soft Nordic light, blonde wood tones, hygge warmth, high-end editorial photography style, shot on medium format camera, shallow depth of field, color grading with soft neutrals, pale woods, Swedish design palette, 8K resolution, photorealistic, hyperdetailed
SE.style_notes: Stockholm creative agency meets Uppsala academia. The epitome of lagom - just right, nothing excessive. Approachable, thoughtful, design-conscious.

PL.name: Poland
PL.prompt: Professional portrait photograph of a South Asian man in his early 30s,  wearing a well-tailored dark jacket with subtle geometric patterns inspired by Polish folk art, modern interpretation of heritage,  warm genuine smile, intelligent and approachable expression, soft studio lighting with subtle rim light, clean neutral background with very subtle warm amber light, suggesting Polish warmth and resilience, high-end editorial photography style, shot on medium format camera, shallow depth of field, color grading with rich reds, clean whites, warm amber tones, 8K resolution, photorealistic, hyperdetailed

BE.name: Belgium
BE.prompt: Professional portrait photograph of a South Asian man in his early 30s,  wearing a distinctive but refined jacket, perhaps in unexpected deep burgundy, Belgian eccentricity tempered with classic European tailoring,  warm genuine smile, intelligent and approachable expression, soft studio lighting with subtle rim light, clean neutral background with very subtle art nouveau lines, Brussels sophistication, high-end editorial photography style, shot on medium format camera, shallow depth of field, color grading with rich burgundies, deep golds, Belgian artistic palette, 8K resolution, photorealistic, hyperdetailed

default.name: International
default.prompt: Professional portrait photograph of a South Asian man in his early 30s,  wearing a refined modern jacket in deep navy, universal professional elegance, warm and approachable academic style,  warm genuine smile, intelligent and approachable expression, soft studio lighting with subtle rim light, clean neutral background with very subtle soft neutral studio light, universal appeal, high-end editorial photography style, shot on medium format camera, shallow depth of field, color grading with sophisticated neutrals, warm but universal palette, 8K resolution, photorealistic, hyperdetailed
